page.title: 03A SCHOOL VISIT
page.content: Yesterday I went on a School Visit to Carew Castle. We had to dress up in the clothes of Tudor times. I dressed up as a lady. First we had to learn a dance. Then we made some hay. We had to cut the grass, put the hay in a line to dry and then turn it over with a fork. After that we went to John the potter. We made some floor tiles out of clay. Next I went to the kitchen. I made bread and herb lard. Later we had some soup that Mistress cook had made and some of the bread that we had made. After that we had to do the dance we had learned for the Lord Rhys.
